abstract: Jon Pareles reviews CMJ Music Marathon concert by punk band Weaves at Pianos.
lead_paragraph: At its five shows, this Toronto band combined cerebral sentiments and non sequiturs with dissonance and a kind of bemusement.

headline.main: Review: Weaves Brings Sonic Slapstick in Shifting Tempos to the CMJ Music Marathon

snippet: At its five shows, this Toronto band combined cerebral sentiments and non sequiturs with dissonance and a kind of bemusement.
